metadata.title: CVE-2021-35607 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: DML). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.26 and prior.Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
